summary: This is a very simple mod that lowers the starting base carrying weight ability of all Playable Races and their Children to be more realistic.~
descriptionHtml:
[size=20][u]More Believable Carrying Weight[/u][/size]

Keywords: weigh, weight, carry, carrying, default, race, races, child, children, number, numbers, reduce, reduced, real, realistic, realism, immersive, immersion, balanced, fair, low, lower, less, more, believable, believe, very, simple, small, minimal, change, changes.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]

[color=#00FFFF][size=10]Description:[/size] [size=4]This is a very simple mod that changes the starting base carrying weight ability of all Playable Races and their Children, no you can't normally play as a Child, but I'm very particular about details like immersion and I didn't like how all Children by default can carry 300 pounds per Child so I changed that to.~

I did this for a more 'realistic' playing experience when it comes to[/size][/color] [size=4]starting carrying weight abilities [color=#00FFFF]and because this had already been done but there were so many complaints about it that I thought I would just make one myself better for every one.~[/color]

The Children versions of these races have 1/3 the carrying weight ability of their Adult versions.~

Optional File: More Believable Carrying Weight & V is exactly the same as More Believable Carrying Weight, but also changes the Vampire Versions of the Playable Races and Children.[/size]

[size=5]The following are exactly the ONLY changes made:[/size]

[size=4]Base Carry Weight:[/size]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-1-1388369310.png[/img]
[size=5]Argonian: 90 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-2-1388369312.png[/img]
[size=5]Brenton: 85 Base Starting Carry Weight
Brenton Child: 28 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-3-1388369313.png[/img]
[size=5]Dark Elf: 95 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-4-1388369314.png[/img]
[size=5]High Elf: 75 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-1-1388369507.png[/img]
[size=5]Imperial: 100 Base Starting Carry Weight
Imperial Child: 33 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-2-1388369508.png[/img]
[size=5]Khajiit: 80 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-3-1388369508.png[/img]
[size=5]Nord: 120 Base Starting Carry Weight
Nord Child: 40 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-4-1388369509.png[/img]
[size=5]Orc: 135 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-1-1388369637.png[/img]
[size=5]Redguard: 115 Base Starting Carry Weight
Redguard Child: 38 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/48929-2-1388369638.png[/img]
[size=5]Wood Elf: 80 Base Starting Carry Weight[/size]



[color=#00FFFF][size=10]Requirements:[/size] [size=4]Shouldn't be any requirements that I know of other than having the Skyrim game for PC.~[/size][/color]


[color=#FFFF00][size=10]Compatibility:[/size] [size=4]NO CHANGES were made to ANY OTHER RACES including the Vampire versions of the above races because Vampires are supernaturally strong and for compatibility.~

Put this AT THE BOTTEM of your mod load list for MAXIMUM compatibility, this should be compatible with mostly every thing although I always put this AT THE BOTTOM of my mod load list just in case, if you are using a Bashed Patch just place this BEFORE the Bashed Patch.~

I made this mod purely for the reason that[/size][/color] [color=#00FF00][size=4]Realistic Carry Weight mod created by Everlive[/size][/color] [size=4][color=#FFFF00]has so many complaints about compatibility: so many people are complaining that mod messes up their game by doing things it shouldn't do and it is outdated I thought, "It can't be THAT hard to make a mod that's compatible with most things, right? So I'll give it a shot.~"

This mod here made by me is what I have done to make all playable races and their children have more believable carrying weight abilities and I made this MAXIMUMLY COMPATIBLE WITH ALMOST EVERY THING UNLIKE THE OTHER MOD THAT TRIES TO DO THIS.~

I made this mod completely on my own from just the default Skyrim game.~[/color][/size]



[color=#00FFFF][size=10]Recommendations:[/size][/color] [size=4]I recommend using this mod [color=#00FFFF]WITH MichaelDusk's and mine's other mod called Werewolves Unleashed[/color] if you like playing as a Werewolf and you want your STARTING Carrying Capacity to be some thing more realistic, place More Believable Carrying Weight AFTER [color=#00FFFF]Werewolves Unleashed[/color] in your mod order list.~[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48956/?][color=#00FFFF][size=5]Werewolves Unleashed[/size][/color][/url]


[size=4][color=#FFFF00]I also recommend using my other mod Athletic Jump WITH[/color][/size] [size=5]More Believable Carrying Weight[/size][color=#FFFF00][size=4],[/size] [size=5]Athletic Jump[/size] [size=4]is a mod that changes the default ability to jump, jump distance, and fall damage height to be more 'athletic' some what more of a 'gymnast' athlete, perfect for trained stealthy agile characters, but still be realistic.~[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49167/?][color=#FFFF00][size=5]Atheltic Jump[/size][/color][/url]


[size=4]Also you can try my other mod called "Realistic Items' Weights and Values": a VERY simple mod that increases the weight and the value of many misc items in the game.~[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49312/?][color=#00FF00][size=5][u]Realistic Items[/u][/size][/color][/url]


[size=5][color=#00FF00]ALL MODS ARE COMPATIBLE AND WORK WELL TOGETHER!~[/color]

If you want to use all of my (and MichaelDusk's) mods together, then place them in this order:

[color=#FFFF00]Athletic Jump or Supernatural Jump[/color]
[color=#00FFFF]Werewolves Unleashed[/color]
[color=#00FF00]Realistic Items' Weights and Values[/color]
More Believable Carrying Weight[/size]



[color=#00FFFF][size=10]Pictures:[/size][/color] [size=4]In-game screenshots were taken by myself and edited to show the base carry weight changes of each race, character creation screen and starting background location shown in screenshots is a combination of:[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][color=#FFFFFF][size=5]RaceMenu[/size][/color][/url]

[size=4]and[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?][color=#00FFFF][size=5]Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/size][/color][/url]


[color=#00FF00][size=10]Comments:[/size] [size=4]PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF THIS WORKS FOR YOU, ANY AND ALL FEEDBACK IS VERY HELPFUL FOR EVERY ONE!~[/size][/color]
author: EnigmaWolf
